description: This file defines the GameState class for managing the current state of a chess game, including board setup, move history, undo functionality, and game modes. It also includes related data classes and enums pertinent to game status and UI highlights.

classes.name: GameState
classes.description: Manages the current chess game state, including the board, move history, game mode, and undo functionality.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the game state to the initial setup, clearing move history.

methods.name: canUndo
methods.description: Returns whether there are moves to undo.

methods.name: undoOne
methods.description: Undoes the last move, if any.

methods.name: undoSmart
methods.description: Performs a smart undo, undoing one or two moves depending on game mode and turn.

methods.name: currentHumanSide
methods.description: Returns which side the human is playing based on game mode and turn.

methods.name: applyMove
methods.description: Records a move into the move history, associating it with its SAN and undo info.

methods.name: historyPairs
methods.description: Returns move history as a list of turn pairs, each with move number and SANs.
